![CM Waters](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/revize_photo_gallery/Photos/CM%20Waters.jpg?t=202508261227570)
Ken Waters

Ken Waters joined the DeSoto City Council on June 16, 2025, winning a competitive run-off election with 60.46% of the vote. A longtime resident of DeSoto for over 20 years, Ken is committed to serving and improving the community he loves. Originally from North Dallas, Ken and his college sweetheart moved to DeSoto soon after they got married and have called DeSoto home ever since. Ken majored in Business Administration from the University of North Texas. Over his career, he has worked across telecommunications, sales, digital marketing, real estate, and entrepreneurship. Ken has been actively involved in numerous community organizations, including leadership roles in the DeSoto Civic Academy Alumni Association, DeSoto Citizens Police and Fire Academy Alumni Associations, and the DeSoto Community Emergency Response Team, where he serves as a Certified Instructor and former Director. Notably, he helped establish a free gun lock safety program through the DeSoto Police Department to promote firearm safety in local homes. Ken is also a proud member of Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, Inc. Outside of his work and community service, he enjoys traveling, health and fitness, music, and lifelong learning.

His personal motto:
